title: Are elementary ESL teachers in high demand in Canada? - Quora
tags: Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL)

response.answer_text: I’m not sure exactly how much demand there is, but there would be some demand in larger urban areas or in rural areas with a large foreign population. The problem seems to be able finding qualified teachers. While you can teach ESL around the world with little more than eagerness, the standards for ESL in English speaking countries are higher. As with any other subject, you have to have some degree of experience in the field. And especially with elementary, ESL becomes one of a handful of subjects that is a specialized subject (compared to elementary math or language arts, which are not specialized at that level).
